# globalFkWeight

**Instance Property**

The solver global forward kinematics demand’s weight.

## Declaration

```swift
var globalFkWeight: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

Multiplied with the per-joint per-axis forward kinematics weight [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/IKComponent/Joint/fkWeightPerAxis].

The initial value is from the respective [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/IKRig/globalFkWeight].
